channel.title: Unexpected Server Response
channel.description:
Hello. I'm rather new to setting up of runescape servers, but have an extensive background in IT.
I've setup 7 or 8 servers (one at a time mind you), and the only ones that seem to work are the 317's. The 508's run, but no one can connect. When attempting to, you receive this error:
Unexpected server response Please try using a different world.
I am using java sdk 6u14 (newest). My enviroment variables are setup. I have a few different compilers.
I will admit, that i have yet to make any of them compile without errors. I also know that they should come with enough to run without being compiled, except i won't be able to make changes (as after 100 errors, the compiler stops). Here are some of the errors, so maybe we can get that part fixed and maybe that'll fix the rest?
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: illegal start of expression public static Frames frames = new Frames(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: illegal start of expression public static Frames frames = new Frames(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: ';' expected public static Frames frames = new Frames(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: illegal start of expression public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: illegal start of expression public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: ';' expected public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: illegal start of expression public static Items items; ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: illegal start of expression public static Items items; ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: ';' expected public static Items items; ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: not a statement public static Items items; ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: illegal start of expression public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: illegal start of expression public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: ';' expected public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate(); ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Any light to be shined on either issue? I've searched the site extensivly, but am drawing a blank. Thank you all!

item.title: Unexpected Server Response
item.dc:creator: @xXGeminiXx xXGeminiXx
item.description:
@xXGeminiXx wrote:

Hello. I’m rather new to setting up of runescape servers, but have an extensive background in IT.

I’ve setup 7 or 8 servers (one at a time mind you), and the only ones that seem to work are the 317’s. The 508’s run, but no one can connect. When attempting to, you receive this error:

Unexpected server response
Please try using a different world.

I am using java sdk 6u14 (newest). My enviroment variables are setup. I have a few different compilers.

I will admit, that i have yet to make any of them compile without errors. I also know that they should come with enough to run without being compiled, except i won’t be able to make changes (as after 100 errors, the compiler stops). Here are some of the errors, so maybe we can get that part fixed and maybe that’ll fix the rest?

.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: illegal start of expression
public static Frames frames = new Frames();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: illegal start of expression
public static Frames frames = new Frames();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:141: ‘;’ expected
public static Frames frames = new Frames();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: illegal start of expression
public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: illegal start of expression
public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:145: ‘;’ expected
public static PlayerMovement playerMovement = new PlayerMovement();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: illegal start of expression
public static Items items;
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: illegal start of expression
public static Items items;
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: ‘;’ expected
public static Items items;
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:149: not a statement
public static Items items;
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: illegal start of expression
public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: illegal start of expression
public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate();
^
.\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:153: ‘;’ expected
public static PlayerUpdate playerUpdate = new PlayerUpdate();
^
100 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Any light to be shined on either issue? I’ve searched the site extensivly, but am drawing a blank. Thank you all!
